tagline.main: The Soul expands, the Body relaxes ‚Äî and your practice flows with more organization. for those who care for people
tagline.sub: When the Soul speaks, the Body relaxes and the Spirit leads.

register.subtitle: Start your 7 days of FREE PRO access
register.name: Name
register.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Know our history and purpose

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Facilitate the professional management of therapies, consultations, and events, connecting professionals and clients through a secure, efficient, and intuitive platform that values human care combined with technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the reference platform in management and connection in the area of integrative health and emotional care, recognized for innovation, reliability, and positive impact on people's lives and society.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Empathy in care, information security, continuous innovation, excellence in experience, and genuine commitment to emotional and human well-being.

developers.title: Our Team
developers.description: Specialized team in developing robust, scalable, and secure technological solutions, focused on the real needs of professionals and clients.

designers.title: Designers
designers.description: Professionals dedicated to creating intuitive, accessible, and welcoming experiences, where technology and sensitivity walk together.

security.title: Security
security.description: Specialists in data protection, privacy, and compliance, ensuring trust, integrity, and tranquility in every interaction on the platform.

about.multilingual_footer: Multilingual platform, currently available in four languages, with the possibility of integrating new languages as KalonConnect evolves.

security.title: Your data, your control!
security.clientData: Client data stays in YOUR Google Drive

waitingRoom.title: Premium Waiting Room
waitingRoom.subtitle: Configure video, ambient music, and client experience before the consultation.
waitingRoom.fileDisclaimer: Supported files: video (MP4, WebM), image (JPG, PNG), audio (MP3, WAV). Maximum size: 50MB.
waitingRoom.roomVisualDesc: Choose which type of media will be displayed to the client.

video.title: Welcome video
video.description: This video will play automatically when the client enters the room.

music.title: Ambient music
music.description: The music will loop while the client waits.

message.title: Client message
message.placeholder: Hello! Welcome to our waiting room. Take a deep breath and relax, we'll start our session soon. I'm preparing everything to serve you in the best way possible.
message.tip: Tip: use simple markers like {client} and {specialty} to personalize the message.

animatedMessage.label: Show animated message
animatedMessage.description: The message will pulse gently during the wait.

allowClientPreview.label: Allow client preview
allowClientPreview.description: The professional can view the client's camera before starting.

alertOnClientJoin.label: Alert when client joins
alertOnClientJoin.description: Plays a discreet sound and shows an alert to the professional.

visualPreferences.title: Visual Preferences
visualPreferences.animatedMessageDesc: The message will pulse gently during the wait.
visualPreferences.allowClientPreviewDesc: The professional can view the client's camera before starting.
visualPreferences.alertOnClientJoinDesc: Plays a discreet sound and shows an alert to the professional.
visualPreferences.multiSpecialtyDesc: Configure different messages for each specialty.

stats.clientsServedDesc: Clients with records in the period

charts.moodEvolutionDesc: Each line represents the moodScore variation over sessions.
charts.noMoodData: No moodScores recorded in the selected period.
charts.noThemes: No themes identified in the period.
charts.modeDistributionDesc: Understand which service formats you use most frequently.
charts.noModeData: Not enough data for the chart.
charts.highlightedWordsDesc: Set of terms most cited in transcriptions and notes.

recentSessions.title: Recent sessions
recentSessions.subtitle: Latest appointments recorded with transcription or notes.

common.editProfileHint: To change logo/data, edit your Profile.

prescription.title: How to use Prescriptions
prescription.text: Fill in patient name, medications, and instructions. Click the signature button, draw or attach your signature, and generate PDF to print or send.

signature.title: How to create Electronic Signature
signature.text: You can sign with mouse, finger (touch) or insert an image. Use gov.br or draw your own signature.

receipt.title: How to issue Receipts
receipt.text: Enter amount, service, and select signature. Generate receipt in PDF, print or send to client.

consent.title: About Consent Form
consent.text: Read the full term, click to listen in audio. The client can sign using mouse or finger.

payment.title: How to configure PIX Payment
payment.text: Register your PIX key by clicking the button. To generate QR Code, enter amount and click "Generate QR".

documents.title: Documents & Legal
documents.subtitle: Complete document system with full accessibility

tutorial.title: üí° How to create a digital signature?
tutorial.text: You can use free digital signature apps or create your own. Click the help button for a full tutorial.

consent.title: Consent Form
consent.read: I have read and agree to the terms

payment.title: PIX Payment
payment.pixKeyPlaceholder: ID, Email, Phone or Random Key

access.normalOrPro: Available in Normal or Pro versions
access.restricted: Feature available only in Normal or Pro version.

help.title: How to use the Financial Panel
help.summaryText: View your income, expenses, pending amounts, and overdue values in colored cards.
help.shortcutsText: Export data, register payments, generate PIX QR Code, and view quick summaries.
help.bankConfigText: Use "Configure Banks" to choose and register PIX keys, accounts, and holder information.
help.accessibilityText: Adjust font size, contrast, and use text-to-speech via the top buttons.

modal.title: Create Folder Structure
modal.nameHelp: This name will be used in the main folder: "KalonConnect - [Your Name]"

success.title: Script downloaded successfully!
success.step1: Locate the downloaded file on your computer
success.step2Windows: Double-click the "criar_pastas_kalon.bat" file to run it
success.step2Unix: Open Terminal, navigate to the download folder and run: chmod +x criar_pastas_kalon.sh && ./criar_pastas_kalon.sh
success.step3: Folders will be created automatically in your Documents folder
success.step4: Copy the "KalonConnect - {name}" folder to your Google Drive
success.step5: Done! Your structure is organized in the cloud
